msbt.message: Rubber spatula, that's the key to mixing sponge cake batter Have to turn the wrist like this Then that. <20_2 arg="6" />Oh! <20_3 arg="6" />I'm so sorry! My mind's somewhere else right now. Let's talk later, .

But in that case Hmmm. But Why would it be like that? Can't be right, at least not in that way <20_2 arg="6" />Oh! <20_3 arg="6" />Were you trying to get my attention? I'm all up in my head, trying to work something out

<20_2 arg="6" />Whaâ€”? <20_3 arg="6" />?You startled me! Sorry, I have a lot on my mind right now and, wellI'd rather talk when I can give you my full attention. Come find me again later, OK? Thanks for understanding.
